name: alarm-service
description: Alarm notification service for sending SMS and email notifications from the alarms table

scripts.copy-ui: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const path=require('path');function copyDir(src,dest){if(!fs.existsSync(dest))fs.mkdirSync(dest,{recursive:true});const entries=fs.readdirSync(src,{withFileTypes:true});for(const entry of entries){const srcPath=path.join(src,entry.name);const destPath=path.join(dest,entry.name);if(entry.isDirectory()){copyDir(srcPath,destPath);}else{fs.copyFileSync(srcPath,destPath);}}}copyDir('src/ui','dist/ui');"
